        public static com.rabbitmq.client.Connection getNewConnection(java.util.Properties env)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                                              java.security.KeyManagementException,
                                                              java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        This function creates a new rabbitmq connection using the properties set in env
        Parameters:
        env - - Properties needed to create a new connection: username, password, rabbit_host, rabbit_port, enable_ssl (optional)
        Returns:
        new Connection
